meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>connection</kanji> <kanji>related</kanji> to another <kanji>connection</kanji> obviously has some kind of <vocabulary>connection</vocabulary>, at least between all those meanings.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
